column2: a pretty good tapas place.  Tasty
column3: but none of the tapas amazed me. If you check-in here through yelp
column4: you get a free paella of your choice (1 person serving).  We ordered the paella de mariscos for the table + same one for the free version.  Surprisingly
column5: the free one tasted better (the rice had more flavor & had a slight char to it..yum). vs. the larger paella was soggier.
